overview.heading: Mesa Virtual Office
overview.body: Reap the rewards of an esteemed business address in Mesa without the financial constraints associated with a brick-and-mortar office. Opus VO lets you position your business in a top Mesa location, all for a fraction of the cost of a traditional office lease. Take advantage of our state-of-the-art conference rooms for critical meetings and customer engagements, while amplifying your brand’s prestige with a distinguished Mesa address.  When you select a virtual office in Mesa through Opus VO, you are treated to the exceptional feature of a live receptionist. Devoted to delivering tailored, superior customer service, our team ensures that each client interaction complements your specific business vision. Entrust us with routine administrative tasks like digital mail organization and advanced call-forwarding, freeing you to focus on scaling your venture.

faqs.question: Can I receive mail under my company name and personal name?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can receive mail under both once your account has been activated.

faqs.question: Do you use an automated phone service or a receptionist to answer?
faqs.answer: We offer a live, personalized receptionist to transfer your calls during business hours Monday to Friday. Calls made after hours will be met with a professional voicemail.

faqs.question: Can I have a virtual office in Mesa, Arizona even if I don’t reside there?
faqs.answer: Yes, and it is a fantastic way to expand your presence to new clients. It will build trust with residents by having your business in the heart of Mesa. You can also adapt to better meet your clients’ unique needs within Arizona.

faqs.question: What do you mean by “all-inclusive services”?
faqs.answer: Our Mesa virtual office offerings include all features listed at the same monthly cost, regardless of the location you choose. Please note that mail centers and some premium locations may not include all options. If you would like additional information, you can compare Opus to our competitors or contact us.

sections.title: Why Choose a Mesa Virtual Office?
sections.body: Mesa is more than a picturesque city in Arizona; it’s a thriving business community rich with opportunities in industries such as aerospace, healthcare, and tourism. Perfectly situated near important business centers, our Mesa location offers you seamless access to indispensable industry contacts and valuable networking opportunities.  By opting for an Opus Virtual Office in Mesa, you are doing more than just cutting back on operational expenses; you’re attaining a noteworthy competitive edge. Catapult your business to unparalleled success by employing our top-notch virtual office services today.  Choose from one of our two Mesa locations @ 625 W Southern Avenue, Mesa, AZ 85210
